scripts.build: handlebars -f pages/NoteTemplate.js views/partials/NoteTemplate.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/ClassTemplate.js views/partials/ClassTemplate.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/NotePageTemplate.js views/NotePageTemplate.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/main.js views/layouts/main.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/404.js views/404.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/HomePage.js views/HomePage.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/NavBarTemplate.js views/partials/NavBarTemplate.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/AddClassButtonTemplate.js views/partials/AddClassButtonTemplate.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/AddNoteButtonTemplate.js views/partials/AddNoteButtonTemplate.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/AddNoteModal.js views/partials/AddNoteModal.handlebars && handlebars -f pages/AddClassModal.js views/partials/AddClassModal.handlebars
